text:
Mr. Archie M. Greer
March 3, 1958
Page 2
you did not test the significance of some of your differences
statistically. The reader has no way of knowing which dif¬
ferences might he attributable to chance.
This study has some interesting implications for educa¬
tional institutions with FM stations or wired-wireless stations.
X would certainly urge that you whip it into shape and send
it off to the NAEB Journal editor. X assume that the NAEB
will be given proper credit when it is published, e.g., "Sup¬
ported in part by a grant from the National Association of
Educational Broadcasters•”
Good luck with the rewrite.
Sincerely,
Sam L. Becker, Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
